body: "She was an absolute delight, a class act, and she will be missed by many": Along the Malecon is saddened by the passing of "a legendary Cuban singer and actress."
original_body: "She was an absolute delight, a class act, and she will be missed by many": Along the Malecon is saddened by the passing of "a legendary Cuban singer and actress."
title: Cuba: Entertainer Dies At 96
